author: Idarak1

text: I wish this and Lost Odyssey would get PC releases, there's definitely money to be made porting them to Steam and no risk in doing so even if they don't sell amazingly well. There just wasn't anything on the 360 that was exclusive that catered to me besides these two games and a handful of others. Unless I could get a 360 that was working and wouldn't RROD for dirt cheap ($20-50) I don't ever see myself getting one.

author: Ahmed360

text: Both Mistwalker RPGs on the Xbox 360 ended up being some of my favorites of that console generation. The game's clean aesthetics was great, mixed with Uematsu's usual goodness. This theme was particularly memorable, it always reminds me of the ruined hospital level filled with ghosts.
